name: Waterdrop G2 Reverse Osmosis System, 7 Stage Tankless RO Water Filter System, Under Sink Water Filtration System, 400 GPD, 1:1 Pure to Drain, Reduces TDS, FCC Listed, USA Tech, WD-G2-W
short_description: Two filters are included in the package. Search "Waterdrop WD-G2-W" for replacement filters. Search "WD-G2-W" for replacement filters. 𝟕 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐅𝐢𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 & 𝐞𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐟𝐢𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:The G2 system is certified by 𝐍𝐒𝐅/𝐀𝐍𝐒𝐈 𝟑𝟕𝟐 for lead-free materials. The G2 RO System adopts a composite filter result in more effective filtration. Our RO system can reduce TDS, PFAS, PFOA, PFOS, vinyl chloride, monobutyl ether, according to reverse osmosis membrane technical manual. 𝟒𝟎𝟎 𝐆𝐏𝐃＆𝟏:𝟏 𝐩𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐝𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨: The Waterdrop G2 reverse osmosis system offers a fast water flow rate of up to 400 GPD. Get a cup of filtered water in about 12 seconds, satisfying your needs while saving time. Compared to the ordinary RO system, the Waterdrop RO system always has a stable water flow. This tankless RO has a low drain ratio of 1:1 and saves water waste by 300%. 𝐈𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐤𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: The tankless design ensures the safety of your family’s drinking water. It also saves over 70% more under-sink storage space than does the ordinary RO system. Note that this reverse osmosis system requires under-sink electricity. 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: The advanced integrated design of the electrical and water circuits reduces leakage. The airtight housing reduces noise, while the process of installing and replacing the filter is faster and more convenient than with other filters. Due to the filters’ twist-and-pull design, you can replace them in 3 seconds. The installation of the RO System takes less than 30 minutes. NOTE: An electrical outlet and drilling holes is required to operate it.

name: SimPure 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis Replacement Filter Set with 75 GPD RO Membrane, 5pc Pre & Post Replacement Cartridge Pack Kit for Standard 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis RO Systems
short_description: Wide Compatibility: Compatible with most 10" standard under the counter reverse osmosis water systems, such as SimPure T1; APEC Water Systems RO-90, ROES-UV75, ROES-PH75 and most standard 5 or 6 stage RO systems. (Quick connect T fittings for systems with screw-in inline filter are also included). Sediment Water Filter: Works as the first barrier in the reverse osmosis system by removing solid particles like rust, sand, dirt and silt from the water and reducing a significant percentage of contaminants in the water. This prevents the other filters from getting clogged with fine particles and reduces the risk of damage to the other parts of the filtration system. Pre-Carbon Filter: 5 micron granular activated carbon and activated carbon block filters protect your system from chlorine damage and remove volatile organic chemicals. Improves the taste of the water and extends RO membrane's life. Reverse Osmosis Membrane: The 75 GPD RO Membrane is specially designed with density graded layers of filtration to filter the hardest to remove contaminants like dissolved solids, microplastics, fluoride, Heavy Metals, and more. It is tested by independent third-party to meet NSF/ANSI 58 standrad. Post-Carbon Water Filter: As the final stage of filtration in your system, this post activated carbon water filter built-in 1/4 inch (JG) quick connections in both two ends removes any remaining contaminants while enhancing the flavor of drinking water. Items with a new or old label randomly sent.

name: Waterdrop TSU 0.01 Micron Ultra Filtration Under Sink Water Filter System, 3-Stage Tankless Under Sink Water Filtration System with Faucet, Smart Panel, Not Lower TDS, Drilling Required
short_description: Save Water & Keep Minerals: This under sink water filter system reduces 30+ substances, and retains essential minerals in the water. No wasted water, no need for power source, and no pressure drop. Note: This under sink water filtration system will NOT REDUCE TDS. Taste the Difference in Our Water: 0.01 micron Waterdrop Ultrafiltration Membrane, this under sink water filtration system filters chlorine, PFAS, taste, odor and heavy metals, offering enhanced taste.Buying bottled water 5 gallons at a time is costly and problematic, no more big bottles of water on your counter. Smart Lifespan Reminder: Sleek black panel with four lights indicates will tell you when to change the filters. 24 Month Filter Lifespan: UF filter with a 24-month lifespan reduces replacement frequency, minimizing long-term maintenance costs.CT filter 12 months,PP filter 6 months. Slim & Space-Saving: Dimensions of 4.68"W x 13.97"H x 14.81"L fit small spaces, suitable for cabinets even with a large food disposal taking up a lot of space. Easy Installation: everything needed to install filter is included in the box,this under sink water filter accommodates both 1/2" and 3/8" under sink water pipes. Premium Nickel Faucet: High-quality brushed nickel faucet adds elegance and durability to your kitchen.

name: 3M Aqua-Pure Under Sink Reverse Osmosis Filtration System 3MRO401
short_description: System is powered by residential line pressure-no electricity required Installs under the sink, quick change design allows for fast and easy replacement filter change outs 5 micron sediment/carbon pre-filter for optimal sediment holding capacity, granulated Activated carbon pre-filter to help protect membrane Designed for both chlorinated or non-chlorinated municipal or well systems Optimized for reduction of nitrates and voc's
product_description: The 3M reverse osmosis filtration system helps provide cleaner, better tasting water through reverse osmosis filtration. It offers multi-stage filtration, incorporating separate sediment and chlorine taste & odor filters for excellent membrane module protection, a sanitary, encapsulated reverse osmosis membrane and carbon block post-filter for superior flow from a dedicated faucet. The product discription, NOT from the manufacturer has an Error, should be updated to: The 3M reverse osmosis filtration system helps provide cleaner, better tasting water through reverse osmosis filtration. It offers multi-stage filtration, incorporating separate sediment and chlorine taste & odor filters for excellent membrane module protection, a sanitary, encapsulated reverse osmosis membrane and carbon block post-filter for superior flow from a dedicated faucet.

name: Membrane Solutions Reverse Osmosis Filter Replacement, 75 GPD Complete Replacement Filter Set For Under Sink 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis Replacement Water Filter System
short_description: Standard Universal Filter - Universal 10 inch Cartridge. Fits most standard under-sink 5 or 6 stage reverse osmosis water filter system, compatible with Express Water, iSpring, Watts, APEC, Global Water, Watts, Premier, Flowmatic, PuROLine, Crystal Quest, Puromax etc. High Adsorption Capacity - Filtration rating of 5 micron, 75 GPD 5 Stage water filter replacement cartridges can effectively remove 99% of contaminants. Which provides fresher and clear water whether for drinking, cooking, showering, aquarium, garden, etc. Easy Installation - Inline carbon filter built-in 1/4 inch (JG) quick connections in both two ends of the filter. Individually wrapped and Drop-in cartridge design allows for quick and easy filter change. 100% Premium Filter - Our high capacity filter replacement cartridge with NSF42 Certified and ISO9001:2015 certificated. Food-grade materials give your more fresher water. Packing List - High capacity water filter set included 5 pieces of cartridge: 1x sediment filters, 1x granular activated carbon filters, 1x carbon block filters, 1x 75 gpd RO membrane, and 1x inline carbon filter

name: Geekpure 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis RO Drinking Water Filter System with Extra 7 Filters-75 GPD
short_description: 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis RO Drinking Water Filter System,Effectively reduces arsenic,lead,fluoride,cadmium,heavy metals .Filters down to 0.0001 micron.Experience fresher healthier baby formula,tea and coffee,better tasting foods and crystal clearer ice cubes Premium quality components ensure high reliability and low maintenance for many years to come. Tube,quick push fittings, storage tank,Ro membrane is NSF certificated System Capacity 75 gallons per day @ 60 psi.Tank Capacity 2.8 gallon,Fits most under sink cabinets,smart size for ensure you get pure water every time.Pipe Size:1/4 inches and 3/8 inches.Feed Water Condition:Water Pressure: 40 - 100 psi,Temperate:40-110°F/5-45°C,Ph:3.0 -11.0,Max TDS :1000 ppm tap water or well water All filters and parts is universal compatible and standard size System comes with high quality quick connect fittings, color coded tubing, and videos for an easy DIY experience,Don’t waste money for professional installation ,you can understand everything about your system and install it with our well-organized instructions in a couple of hours

name: COMFEE’ 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis System, NSF Certified Water Filter for Under Sink, Easy DIY Installation, Ultra Safe Drinking Water Filtration System, Leak-Free RO System, Quiet Operation, 75 GPD
short_description: Noted: Iteration of new and old products, transparent and opaque random distribution[ Reverse Osmosis System ]: COMFEE’ 5 stage reverse osmosis system effectively filters out heavy metals (e.g. Lead, Cadmium, and Chrome), organic matter, harmful substances, and 1000+ impurities, with a precision of 0.0001 microns. The RO water filter system gives you clear, clean, odorless water with a TDS reduction rate which is more than 90%. [ Certified & Lead-Free Materials ]: The COMFEE’ water filter system uses lead-free materials, certified by NSF372, in all water-contacting parts of the purification system, including the water faucet, and water path, and water tank. COMFEE' water filtration system is ideal for people who want lead-free water right at home. Note: If the water pressure is below 0.25Mpa and the water temperature is below 25℃, the GPD will be reduced to 50. [ 20-Year Professional Experience ]: COMFEE’ has 20 years of experience as a professional water treatment manufacturer dedicated to R&D and manufacturing. Enjoy fresh-taste water even better than most bottled water with COMFEE' reverse osmosis system and use the great-quality water for making delicious coffee, crystal-clear ice and healthy baby formula every time you turn on the faucet. [ Excellent Sealing & Easy Installation ]: The double O-Rings offer excellent sealing for leak-free filter housing connection and the quick-fit connectors for easy pipe connection. By using the step-by-step written instruction and tutorial video, the installation of COMFEE’ 5 stage reverse osmosis system will be simple and only requires basic plumbing knowledge. [ American Professional Customer Service ]: As one of the most customer-centric companies in the world, COMFEE' commits to giving the highest level of product and service to every person. Call us anytime when you have any questions, our American professional customer service team will give you a fast response and solution. [ Quiet Operation& Money Saving ]: COMFEE’ water filter for sink works below 43dBA without a pump, offering a silent operation. The drinking water filter system is low-maintenance because it doesn't need electricity. There is no need to install a socket under the sink. [ Filter Lifetime and Replacement ]: PP filter 4 to 6 months (Transparent 1st stage for easy visual inspection); Pre-Carbon filter, carbon block filter, and post-carbon filter 6 to 12 months. RO filter 2 to 3 year lifetime. (Recommended lifetime for reference. Actual lifetime varies according to local water source). Replace the filter bottle every two years to avoid cracking and leaking. For replacement filters, please search B095BCP9L1 and B0BTSPPK8N on Amazon.
product_description: As a way of avoiding tap water, many of us load up on bottled water, but over time this can get very expensive and it's also terrible for the environment. A better solution? Make the water we already have cleaner, fresher, and safer to drink — and that means getting a water filter system. COMFEE' 5-stage reverse osmosis system will help remove contaminants such as chlorine, lead, and hazardous chemicals from tap water. Plus, it makes the water taste better. Use COMFEE' water filtration system to get healthier and better-tasting water in a more affordable way. Search B095BCP9L1 if you'd like to get 1-year replacement filter sets.

name: APEC Water Systems ROES-PH75 Essence Series Top Tier Alkaline Mineral pH+ 75 GPD 6-Stage Certified Ultra Safe Reverse Osmosis Drinking Water Filter System
short_description: Supreme quality – designed and engineered with only premium components to ensure high quality filtration and a durable reverse osmosis system for years This 75 GPD 6-stage system ROES-PH75 is guaranteed to remove up to 99% of impurities such as Chlorine, Taste, Odor, VOCs, as well as harmful Fluoride, Arsenic, Lead, Heavy Metals and 1000+ impurities. Max Total Dissolved Solids - 2000 ppm. Feed Water Pressure 40-85 psi Premium made filter cartridge uses premium-grade calcium from trusted source for safe, proven water ph enhancement. Enjoy ultra-pure drinking water with added calcium minerals for improved alkalinity and great taste. WQA certified system. Premium long lasting filters used to treat tap/well water. Provides unlimited clean drinking water. America's no.1 rated water filter brand with 20 years of success guaranteeing trouble free, noise-free system for long lasting, dependable, pure drinking water.
product_description: The ROES-PH75 is a 6-stage 75 GPD reverse osmosis water filtration system that adds calcium minerals to enhance the water taste for people who prefer mineral water. This system features a premium mineral cartridge that adds only high-purity calcium carbonate to effectively raise pH in the water for those who desire alkaline water. Other re-mineralization reverse osmosis systems will claim to add various beneficial minerals back into the water; however, their mineral formulations are often from unknown and uncertified sources that can lead to potential health concern.

name: Waterdrop 10UA Under Sink Water Filter System, Reduces PFAS, PFOA/PFOS, Lead, Chlorine, Bad Taste & Odor, Under Counter Water Filter Direct Connect to Kitchen Faucet, NSF/ANSI 42 Certified, 8K Gallons
short_description: Compatibility: Suitable for faucets with 1/2" or 3/8" FEMALE NPT thread. If a female threaded connector is needed to connect to your faucet, please contact us BEFORE purchase. Less than ＄25.99 per replacement filter WD-RF10(Search " B085G66JTZ "on Amazon), save over 50% of cost on subsequent use. [After Sales Assistance] Waterdrop Backs the WD-10UA's high-end technical performance with a comprehensive prorated performance service; should a quality issue arise with the filter, you can contact us. [Deep Filtration and IAPMO Certified] Based on independent testing, this filter can efficiently reduces PFAS, PFOA/PFOS, large-particle contaminants such as rust, lead, chlorine, heavy metals, chemical impurities, and sand through thorough purification for clean drinking water. The filter is made of high BPA-free and lead-free materials. It also can successfully reduce chlorine, taste, and odor. This filter is certified by IAPMO against NSF/ANSI 372 Standard and NSF/ANSI 42 Standard. It can lower lead when tested by a third-party laboratory against NSF/ANSI 53 standards. Please use the "WD-10UA" search term to review the 42&372 certification on the IAPMO website. [Innovative Design] Only a cold-water source should be used to power the filter. Its twist-and-lock construction and push-to-connect fittings enable installation in three minutes, three second replacement, and safety-assuring integration. This filter comes with a 3/8" line that connects directly to US sinks' standard 3/8" feed water valves. The system is connected to 1/2" and 3/8" cold water pipes and faucets with the use of the 3/8"-1/2" convertor fitting. [Solve Clogging Problem] By upgrading the filtration area, our filter now provides a 20X increase in dirt adhesion area, enhancing filtration capability while minimizing the risk of clogging. [Filter Replacement and Long Lifespan] This filter system may be upgraded with a UF filter or a MZ filter to meet your water needs. It is compatible with several filters with various functions. Each filter system has a maximum service life of 12 months or 8k gallons when used with municipal water, which is sufficient to cover the needs of an entire household. Before going on vacation, please Put the filters in separate sealed plastic bags, and store the bags in your refrigerator (NOT the freezer) to keep it fresh in 30 days.

name: Watts Premier RO Pure Plus VOC 4 Stage Reverse Osmosis System Module with Built-In Check Valve Shutoff, Four Easy Push Button Filters, Sediment Filter, Carbon Block Filter, VOC Filter, Membrane
short_description: COMPREHENSIVE RO SYSTEM: Say goodbye to unpleasant tastes and odors with the Watts Premier RO Pure Plus System, a compact reverse osmosis unit designed to fit under small counter spaces. Four pre-installed filters, a parts bag, brushed nickel top-mount twist air-gap faucet, and 3-gallon metal storage tank collectively work together to ensure crystal clear, great-tasting drinking water every time. HIGHLY EFFECTIVE FILTRATION: This kit includes one 5-Micron Sediment Filter for reducing dirt, silt, and rust that affect the taste and appearance of your water; one 5-Micron Carbon Block Filter for reducing chlorine taste and odors; one VOC Carbon Block Final Polishing Filter for removing Volatile Organic Compounds; one 50 GPD Membrane for reducing impurities such as dissolved solids. SMART DESIGN: This space-saving system requires fewer tube connections and includes check valves in the filter lid between cartridges to prevent backflow, as well as check valves in each filter head that shut off water flow when the cartridges are removed, and double O-rings for leak prevention. Furthermore, the pre-installed filters feature a push button release that allows for hassle-free replacement with no special tools required! QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Certified to NSF/ANSI Standards 53, 58, and 372, all elements in this system are constructed from high quality materials. Maximum operating pressure is 80 psi. Filter life may vary based upon local water conditions or use patterns, but we recommend replacing sediment and carbon pre-filters every 6 months, VOC filter once a year, and the membrane every 2 to 5 years. THE PREMIER DIFFERENCE: Since our founding in 1989, Premier has been dedicated to the design, development, and marketing of high-quality water filtration systems that exceed industry standards. Following our Watts Water Technologies in 2001, our audience and influence have only expanded, solidifying Watts Premier as a trusted leader in the industry.
product_description: Say goodbye to unpleasant tastes and odors with the Watts Premier RO Pure Plus System, a compact reverse osmosis unit designed to fit under small counter spaces. Four pre-installed filters, a parts bag, brushed nickel top-mount twist air-gap faucet, and 3-gallon metal storage tank collectively work together to ensure crystal clear, great-tasting drinking water every time. This kit includes one 5-Micron Sediment Filter for reducing dirt, silt, and rust that affects the taste and appearance of your water; one 5-Micron Carbon Block Filter for reducing chlorine taste and odors; one VOC Carbon Block Final Polishing Filter for removing Volatile Organic Compounds; one 50 GPD Membrane for reducing impurities such as dissolved solids. With minimal space requirements, this compact system requires fewer tube connections and includes check valves in the filter lid between cartridges to prevent backflow, as well as check valves in each filter head that shut off water flow when the cartridges are removed, and double O-rings for leak prevention. Furthermore, the pre-installed filters feature a quick push button release that allows for hassle-free replacement with no special tools required! Certified to NSF/ANSI Standards 53, 58, and 372, all elements in this system are constructed from high quality materials. Maximum operating pressure is 80 psi. Filter life may vary based upon local water conditions or use patterns, but we recommend replacing sediment and carbon pre-filters every 6 months, VOC filter once a year, and the membrane every 2 to 5 years.
